location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Thomas Hodges, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter informs that other letters have been sent that contain information on George Skipp's negotiations with Karim Khan at Shiraz. It is reported that a missing box of stationery has been found aboard the Eagle.
